issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Due to synchronization and all the loops performed during queue creation, setting a large amount of queues (12000+) will completely choke the scheduler. To deal with this some optimization to "QueueManager.updateAllocationConfiguration(AllocationConfiguration queueConf)" should be done to reduce the amount of unnesecary loops. The attached patch have been tested to work with atleast 96000 queues.
fields.summary: Large number of queues choke fair scheduler

comments.body: Adding patch
[~johang], Thanks for reporting this... I don't think the patch has been successfully uploaded though. Kindly re-attach.
Sorry, I re-uploaded it and I think it should be visible now
The patch looks reasonable. Could you comment on your queue setup (depth, average breadth etc.) for the 96,000 queues that you tested this on? Just curious.
+1 pending jenkins

Basically its a tree as follows ranging from 1 to 16000. For each user group there is one general queue and one with weight divided sub queues.

root
  - 1
  - q1
       - veryhigh
       - high
       - default
       - low
       - verylow

As I done seem to be able to edit the above comment and the tree ended up weird I'll repast it below

root:
    1
    q1:
         veryhigh
         high
         default
         low
         verylow
Please let me know if there is anything I can do to continue the process of merging this
Looking into it.
Thanks for the feedback Karthik, I'll try to have a fixed patch ready by next week.

I fixed the patch according to the feedback from [~kasha].
I also tested it in our test env and check compatibility of the following unit tests.

- org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.fair.TestQueueManager
- org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.webapp.TestRMWebServicesFairScheduler
- org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.fair.TestMaxRunningAppsEnforcer
- org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.webapp.dao.TestFairSchedulerQueueInfo
- org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.fair.TestFairScheduler
- org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.fair.TestFSLeafQueue
- org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.fair.TestAppRunnability
